topics.body: The thing about ebola is that it actually tends to burn itself out if it does not have a steady stream of fresh carriers. It kills too quickly.

unfortunely africa is full of poor people who are just perfect meal for any disease so its gonna take some time before they run out.

but like i said, something was gonna kill those poor bastards, hunger, bad sanitary conditions, war.

too bad they got one of the worst ways.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b38524636872581cac0000#post_53b38524636872581cac0000
[bq="gasmaskangel"]The thing about ebola is that it actually tends to burn itself out if it does not have a steady stream of fresh carriers. It kills too quickly.[/bq]
I think that's what everyone is hoping for and that's the doctor's plan of attack as well; hoping it burns itself out.  However don't be a optimist in this occassion cause right now the disease is spreading at around the ~20% mark a week.  The fact it's increasing around 20% a week is one of those "well fuck me" moments.

If they could just stop the disease from spreading further it would burn itself out, but that's highly unlikely at this point.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b3815a6368726d21410100#post_53b3815a6368726d21410100
It could spread to the Balkans
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b3865463687249a4ba0000#post_53b3865463687249a4ba0000
[bq="Whatevs"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b3815a6368726d21410100#post_53b3815a6368726d21410100
It could spread to the Balkans [/bq]
Maybe, but it wouldn't be as severe of a outbreak.  If it spreads to Europe we're talking tens of thousands dead.  If it spreads across the Sahara we're talking at least a couple million on the extremely low retardely optimistic where people think the world is sunshine and kittens level low ballpark estimate.


Call me a pessimist but if it spreads across the Sahara I wouldn't be surprised if it killed a couple hundred million cause let's face it most African and Middle Eastern countries do not have the resources to fight such a large scale outbreak.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b38daf636872723f870400#post_53b38daf636872723f870400
Battle Network is an underrated branch of the Megaman franchise.
A Battle Network MMO would've been awesome. But Capcom is just, incompetent for such feat.

A Megaman BN EqG/Pony crossover would be so cool. You have the human operator, and the Ponies as Net Navies. Equestria would serve as a cyber-space of some sort.

Or you could have Ubisoft team up with Hasbro, to make a EqG Watch Dogs, Compromised School. Or a Pony version, called Watch Ponies.
